description: It’s one thing to know your wife is cheating on you, but a whole other deal when you have to lie on the floor right below your wife’s pussy in reverse cowgirl position, getting reamed by someone else’s huge cock. But that is Jimmy’s lot in life cause his real estate agent wife Veruca and her strip club owner client Jason are not gonna stop fucking any time soon. Finally, Jason delivers a huge load — right on Jimmy’s chest, and Veruca makes her hapless husband lick it up. (Part 2 of 2)
title: Real Estate Cuckold (Part 2)
